segments.text: I see the woman standing in the water, drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so calm and collected, like nothing is bothering her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she must be really focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit confused by her lack of reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's even aware of the water around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, drying that plate like it's a normal day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she must be really deep in thought, not paying attention to her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn't slip and fall in all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she would just turn off the faucet and save herself the trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
